long_description: Our Novara Buzz(R) offers 24 speeds and beefy tires to tackle varied urban terrain. The sturdy chromoly design is also outfitted with mechanical disc brakes and a performance-oriented riser bar. 4130 chromoly frame and pinpoint fork offer a sturdy, heads-up ride that cruises up and down roads with a steely-smooth ride quality. 24-gear drivetrain works smoothly and precisely to ensure clean shifts and efficient pedaling, whether spinning up the last hill before home or cruising down the bike path. Tektro Aquila mechanical disc brakes make sure, consistent work of managing speed in all conditions so you can ride and brake confidently year-round. Tough wheels are laced to loose ball bearing hubs to ensure lasting, smooth-rolling performance. Puncture-resistant Kenda tires feature a wide, stable contact patch, versatile tread pattern and reflective sidewalls for enhanced visibility. Cockpit has been designed for comfort and an upright ride, thanks to the plush Velo Buzz saddle and riser handlebar. Frame and fork feature eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (sold separately). Just get on and ride, no fancy shoes required-platform pedals accommodate a variety of shoes. Specs on our Novara Buzz bike are subject to change.
